Kwa upande wa kutafuta kwa maana ya maandishi, kwa hoja vifaa vya juu zaidi vya utaftaji ni IBM's Watson. Kuna habari nyingi hapa. Hazihifadhi hifadhidata ya maana. Badala yake, hutafuta majibu ya maswali ambapo habari ya the answer is arranged so that it has a high probability of corresponding to the information of the question.  So they don't assume they know the meaning of either the question or the answer; the objective is to look for a likely connection.

Unaonekana kuwa na wazo kwamba lango la quantum ni kitu cha mwili badala ya kitu cha dhana tu. Sio lazima kufanya kazi kwa njia hiyo. Wakati milango ya CMOS kawaida ni vifaa halisi vya mwili, milango ya kiasi inaweza kuwa dhana tu. Fikiria mtego wa ion. Ions inawakilisha qubits kwa kutumia jimbo moja la elektroniki kama $ | 0 \ rangle $ na nyingine kama $ | 1 \ rangle $. Lango la quantum linafanywa kwa kutumia $ 4 \ mara 4 $ umoja matrix kwa mbili ya ions hizi. Hii inafanywa kwa kuangaza mlolongo wa mapigo ya laser kwenye ions. Sio kifaa cha mwili ndani which two ions are input, in which they interact, and out of which the ions come with their states changed.   Quantum gates are performed by shining laser pulses on the ions, but there's not necessarily one laser per quantum gate—the same lasers are used for many different quantum gates. Thus, you can't point to any specific piece of hardware and say "this is the quantum gate".    And if you use flux qubits in superconductors for your quantum computer, the quantum gates don't use lasers at all, and they look completely different (and slightly more like CMOS devices).

Kimsingi hoja hiyo hiyo imetolewa na Andries P.J. van der Walt (1976, Lemma 2.3 na Mfano 2.9) kwa lahaja ya lemma ya kusukumia ambapo $ n $ herufi zimewekwa alama na zote three of $x$, $y$, $z$ must contain marked letters.  See also Autebert, Boasson, and Cousineau (1978) for more properties of abstract families of languages satisfying this variant of the pumping lemma.

Lengo ni kubeba mabadiliko ya nguo na MacBook Air (1.7 cm juu, 29.95 cm kwa upana, 19.2 cm kirefu na kilo 1.06) kwenye safari ya 14km. Nimetumia Ortlieb Panniers (kwenye rack ya tubus) lakini sipendi jinsi visigino vyangu vinaweza kuwagonga, kwa njia wanavyoshika pande au njia wanayoongeza Drag. Imetengenezwa vizuri! Pia sitaki uzito wote upande mmoja na sitaki kubeba mbili kati yao. Mkoba ni njia ya sweaty pia. Suluhisho bora zaidi ya rack hadi sasa ni Rixen & Kaul Rackpack 1 iliyowekwa kwenye Rixen & Kaul Freerack (samahani, haiwezi kupata kiunga cha huyo). MacBook Air 11 "(wazi - hakuna sleeve), jozi ya jeans na shati ni kifafa. Vitu vingine huenda upande na vinaweza kufanya kazi. Lakini naona kuwa sio suluhisho nzuri kwa sababu The Laptop lazima iwekwe kwa diagonally na makali nyembamba kushikamana. Kwa muda makali makali ya kompyuta ya mbali hakika yatavaa kupitia begi, na ajali yoyote itasababisha uharibifu mwingi kwenye kompyuta ndogo. Nimejaribu pia Pakiti ya juu ya Deuter 10L - pia ni ndogo sana, sio nzuri kabisa kama Rixen & Kaul na kiambatisho cha Velcro ni polepole sana na sio salama. Nina mambo mengi mazuri ya kusema juu ya Rixen & Kaul. ni begi iliyotengenezwa vizuri na wakati i had a problem with the clip they sorted it out right away. This bag is just a little bit too small to be perfect. The click fix system is great. I have thought of removing the click fix mount and assign it to some other bag but it's a last resort and chances are my home-made solution is not going to be as nice as the ideal bag I'm wanting.  Update: I looked at the Topeak Office MTX and it isn't for me. Inside it has a big divider/pocket thing that takes a lot of space and can't be removed. It doesn't appear to be particularly sturdy, especially the attachment mechanism. Their beam rack product has a quick release fastener rather than bolts so anyone could just unclip and walk away with it. The rack is just not finished as well as the Tubus/Rixen-Kaul racks I already have, it feels chunky and heavy.  The solution looks like it is the Ortlieb Office High Visibility QL3 - 30x40x17cm, 21l (unfortunately it's more expensive than the Topeak bag and rack system). While it is still side-mounted the QL3 system attaches to my existing rack so I can still use my current rack top bag with it's special mount when I don't need so much space. Position on the bike is widely adjustable so heel strike isn't an issue. It's rectangular so folded clothes will hopefully stay folded rather than falling down into the pointy bit of my older tapered Ortlieb panniers. It is waterproof without needing a rain cover. It's eerily reflective over its whole surface.

Kwa kuzingatia nasibu inayozalishwa na/au mti (na miili), tunaweza kuhesabu uwezekano kwamba mzunguko utawakilisha kazi maalum ya boolean hadi fasihi 3 za pembejeo. Kuanzia 4 (au angalau 5) fasihi, mfumo wa equations inakuwa ngumu sana kuhesabu, na inahoji hata ikiwa usambazaji wa pato la kazi za Boolean unaweza kukadiriwa kwa uhakika. Tazama D. Gardy, Maneno ya Boolean yasiyokuwa ya kawaida, Sura ya 3.4.3. Mstari mwingine wa utafiti unashughulika na swali la jinsi mizunguko yenye nguvu ya boolean iko mbele ya kelele au milango mbaya. Tazama P. Gács, A. Gál, mipaka ya chini kwa ugumu wa mizunguko ya kuaminika ya boolean na milango ya kelele na A. mozeika, D. Saad, juu ya hesabu ya kuaminika na fomula za kelele za boolean ambazo explicitly consider random Boolean formulas.  My question is if there is correlation between the probability/frequency of a certain Boolean function and the resilience of a given generating circuit (formula) against noise. In other words, can we estimate (or at least get some bounds on) the probability of a function from the circuit's noise resilience which we could try to measure by causing arbitrary perturbations to gates and see how the resulting function reacts?  My intuition is that circuits representing simple Boolean functions with high probability such as the tautology TRUE or the output of a single literal will tolerate higher noise levels since those circuits have a higher "density" in the space of all possible circuits of a given size.

Nilikuwa nikipanda mvua miezi michache iliyopita na nikaanguka kugeuza kona ya 90 °. Hapa kuna maelezo: Kupanda baiskeli ya barabara na matairi mpya ya 25mm laini yaliyowekwa kwa psi 100 (Cannondale Synpapse na Gatorskins za Bara zilijaa kilo 690) ilikuwa ikinyesha kwa angalau saa, lakini haikuwa mvua wakati wa wakati wa Kuanguka hakukuwa na mafuta dhahiri au vinywaji vingine karibu, hakuna uchafu au vitu vingine hakukuwa na upepo mkali na hali ya joto ilikuwa juu ya kufungia nilikuwa nikipanda karibu 10 mph (16 km/h) karibu na kona kwenye lami laini nina uzito wa 210 lbs (kilo 95) Nilianguka ndani yangu, upande wa kulia kuanguka kulikuwa mara moja bila skidding kubwa au kuteleza hapa ni picha ya corner, with a red square where I slipped:     I was surprised to discover that the smooth tires are not particularly the culprit in my fall, as bicycle tires for on-road use have no need of any sort of tread features; in fact, the best road tires are perfectly smooth, with no tread at all.   (Edit: Per multiple comments and answers, the above link is not specific to wet surfaces and the assertion that no tread is optimal does not apply here. It appears treads should help with wet surfaces.)  I live in a desert climate so I haven't had much experience with slippery roads, and none since that accident. Is there anything I could have done to avoid falling, or do I simply need to avoid any wet, asphalt surfaces?

Uko sawa kutafuta kupunguzwa kutoka kwa shida ya jumla. Shida ndogo ni kupata subset $ s '$ ya $ s $ kwamba $ \ sigma_ {s' \ katika s '} s' = t $. Lakini hii inaweza kupunguzwa kwa shida yako ya kifuniko cha muda na vipindi $ \ {(0, s): s \ katika s \} $, $k = t$, $L = 1$. Therefore the interval cover problem is NP-hard.  PS Why don't you make all the intervals, input and output, half-open at the same end? That way you eliminate the finite set of points at which the sum of indicator functions is different.

Imefanywa kidogo ya kuangalia juu na inaonekana kama sura yako inachukua mlima wa moja kwa moja wa E-aina. Kwa kuwa XTR DI2 Front Mech mpya hutumia mfumo wa kuweka wa kawaida ungenunua tu mlima wa aina ya E, bolt kwa sura na ambatisha FD kwa hii. I've gone off the photo above to determine FD mount type. Looks like the E-Type to me, so the mount here should be all you need. The picture on Chain Reaction Cycles doesn't show the correct mount. It should look like the image below!

Hii inasikika kama suala katika freehub yako/freewheel (zote mbili ni sawa kwa swali hili). Hii ndio inakuruhusu pwani bila kuogelea. Ndani ya miili hii ni seti ya "pawls" ambayo itashuka na kushirikisha safu kadhaa za splines wakati wa kuzungushwa "mbele", na kusukuma baiskeli mbele. Halafu, ikiwa utawasogeza katika mwelekeo mwingine "nyuma", pawls zimeundwa kuwa pushed out of the way of the spline.  Given how old your bike is, there is probably a build up of dirt and drying out of grease inside these that are causing the pawls to be stuck in the "up" position and not able to grab the splines.  In this case, your local shop should be able to fix that right up by replacing the part.

Shida ni kiasi cha cable ya ndani iliyo wazi - nje inapaswa kuwa ngumu dhidi ya kibadilishaji, na adjuster (iliyovunjika) ya pipa inayotumika kwa tuning nzuri. Ikiwa utateleza nje hadi kwenye kibadilishaji unapaswa kuwa na uwezo wa kutosha mwisho wa kitovu o ambatisha. Kuanzia hapa unaweza kupata baiskeli inayoweza kutumika, lakini kwa adjuster ya pipa iliyovunjika hautaweza kumaliza mabadiliko ya gia. Adjuster ya pipa iliyovunjika inahitaji replacing, which means removing the full inner cable. Normally this means a new inner is needed as any frayed end won't easily be able to slide back into the housing. (You can waste hours trying save the couple of dollars a new inner costs)   In case there are more problems than described above, I would got though the process of getting the shifter working (even if roughly) with the existing cable and housing, then deal with the broken barrel adjuster.

Badala ya kukaa karibu na kit cha mvua, unapaswa kubadilishwa (kwenye vyoo ikiwa ni lazima), hata ukidhani kuwa gia ya baiskeli yenye mvua inafaa nambari yako ya mavazi. Shorts za aina ya mazoezi/mpira wa miguu utakauka wakati wa mchana ikiwa unayo mahali pa kuyasambaza (chini ya dawati lako kwa mfano). Pia ni nafuu. Tafuta kitambaa nyembamba cha syntetisk. Kama @Andy256 anasema katika maoni, kuzisonga kwa kitambaa pia itasaidia. Nimepata kaptula kadhaa za MTB ambazo ni nzuri kabisa kwa kupanda ndani lakini hukaa kwa muda mrefu zaidi - ni kitambaa cha kukausha haraka lakini tabaka 2 zake. Usisahau chochote unachovaa chini - chukua spares (na soksi). Ninapendekeza kutafuta wale walio na pockets.  It's not a long ride, you don't need cycling-specific stuff. In warm weather I've found that riding in rain-proof gear you can get almost as wet as without it from sweat plus the rain that sneaks in.  Obviously when it gets cold riding in a single layer of wet stuff isn't a good idea.  I found gym shorts absolutely fine for 15km each way every day even in the wet, so long as it's warm enough. But then I've also ridden 25km each way in hiking gear with no trouble -- I must be lucky with my saddle fit.  On a road/touring bike the saddle may be less forgiving of seams and fit than on my hybrid.

Matengenezo mengi ya baiskeli ni moja kwa moja mbele ikiwa lazima uwe na zana na ujue unafanya nini. Ikiwa baiskeli haijatumika sana na imekuwa katika mazingira kavu kwenye karakana, basi haifai kuhitaji sana kuifanya tena. Angalia matairi ya nyufa kwenye barabara ya pembeni na/au kiwanja cha mpira kuwa ngumu/brittle - watahitaji kuchukua nafasi ikiwa hii ndio kesi. Angalia mnyororo kwa kutu, lakini assuming it isn't too bad, should be easy to clean up and re-lube following a guide online.  Check the brakes work (and check the brake cables for rust).  Check the gears change (and check the cables for rust).  If you find yourself in the position where the chain/cables/brakes need replacing, its probably best to have a shop do it until you are more familiar with maintenance.  Otherwise, you should be able to do it all yourself.

@Dave Clarke, l = a* | b* itakuwa mviringo, lakini l* itakuwa (a | b)*. Kwa upande wa kuamua, lugha $ l $ ni ya mviringo ikiwa kuna $ l '$ kama kwamba $ l $ ndio kufungwa chini ya + ya $ l' $ au ikiwa ni umoja wa lugha ya mviringo. (I'm dying to redefine "circular" replacing your $>$ with $\ge$. It simplifies things a lot. We can then characterise the circular languages as those for which there exists a NDFA whose starting state has only epsilon-transitions to accepting states and has an epsilon-transition to each accepting state).

Ninaunda TCX 2 kubwa ambayo ina Giant CR41, 32-shimo kama habari pekee ninayoweza kupata. Hakuna kitu kilichochapishwa kwenye rims wenyewe. Hivi sasa inatumia 700 x 35c Kenda ndogo block nane kukunja matairi 120tpi ambayo ilikuja nayo lakini ningependa kubadilika kuwa slick na kuwa na found some 28c's that are an amazing deal.  As per Sheldon Brown I'm likely ok putting on 28c's since they fall within the range of rim where you'd find 35c's but not always. Kulingana na habari kutoka kwa Sheldon Brown, chapisho lako kubwa linawezekana kuwa 30.8 kwani hii inaonekana kuwa ya kawaida na chapa hiyo - hata hivyo hautoi umri na mfano wa baiskeli, kwa hivyo inaweza kubadilishwa kuwa kubwa kuwa saizi nyingine. Mtaalam wa njama ndani yangu anafikiria yake kwa hivyo wanauza baiskeli mpya wakati wa kupata nafasi ya kiti inayolingana. Pia nimekuwa na shida hii (na chapa nyingine), na zaidi ya orodha ya Ebay na Craigs kwenye vain hope sellers will put the size on the listing and its accurate, your best bet is to try your luck with your corner LBS (Not the chain-shop who only has this years stock and is shiny and flash) - good chance they have one in back somewhere. Shops that have been around for a while tend to keep boxes of odd ball sized parts such as these, (rather than throw them away) as it's good for business being the "The only guy in town who...." kind of place.

Rims inaweza kudumu muda mrefu sana. Njia ya kutofaulu (zaidi ya ajali) ni kuvaa tu kwa nyuso za kuvunja kwa wakati (tazama swali hili). Unaweza kuvaa kabisa uso wa mdomo na breki zako hadi mdomo uwe dhaifu sana. Some rims designed for commuters have a groove in them that is designed to indicate wear. When you can no longer see the groove, you know its time to replace the rim (might as well replace the wheel).  Here's an excellent description of rim wear.

Lance Fortnow ameandika nakala juu ya mada hii: Ugumu wa Kolmogorov na ugumu wa computational unapaswa pia kuangalia utangulizi wa ugumu wa Kolmogorov na matumizi yake na Li na Vitanyi, kitabu dhahiri juu ya mada hiyo. Hasa, Sura ya 6 "Njia ya Ukamilifu" inajadili a number of applications in complexity such as a Kolmogorov complexity proof of Hastad's switching lemma (from Circuit Lower Bounds à la Kolmogorov by Fortnow and Laplante).  And there are applications in communication complexity (e.g. Kolmogorov Complexity and Combinatorial Methods in Communication Complexity by Kaplan and Laplante).

Unataja bolts nne, je! Kiti chako cha kiti kinaonekana kitu kama hiki: kwa kubuni, hizi zinaweza kuinua vizuri dhidi ya viti vyote vya ukubwa, tofauti na mifano mbili za bolt ambazo zinahitaji shims za ukubwa sahihi: hata hivyo, na bolt nne zipo zipo Baadhi ya mapango: Je! Unayo kaboni au kiti cha aluminium? Na zote mbili, lazima uwe mwangalifu kwani inawezekana kuponda kiti cha kiti ikiwa unaimarisha bolts sana. Katika visa hivi, unaweza kutaka kuuliza msaada wa duka la baiskeli - wanaweza kukupa kiwanja cha kaboni cha kaboni ambacho kitasaidia kwa msuguano, na pia kaza bolts kwa kutumia wrench ya torque kuzuia kuanguka kwa kiti. Ikiwa unayo kiti cha chuma, ni karibu na haiwezekani kwako kaza bolts sana. Ikiwa vichwa vya bolt vimevuliwa, pata vifungo vipya kwenye duka lako la vifaa na upate chuma bora (kumbuka: bolts zilizo na tundu la tundu heads are stronger than the bolts with the button cap shown in the photo). Be sure to tighten in an X-pattern, just as if you were tightening the lug nuts on a car tire or the bolts on a head gasket. Rather than an allen key, you might want to use a hex bit in a socket wrench, you can get much more torque:      With the proper amount of torque on the bolts, it really shouldn't twist under normal circumstances. You could drill a hole to pin it, but that would weaken your seatpost.  Instead, you may try using some blue loctite on the bolts to make sure your bolts are not backing themselves out and a bit of the same friction compound used in carbon fiber bikes on the seatpost to add just a tad more friction.   p.s. When buying second-hand, always make sure your product isn't subject to a CPSC recall such as this one: https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/1998/CPSC-Riteway-Products-Announce-Recall-of-Bicycle-Trailers

Unahitaji kurekebisha derailleur b-screw. Hiyo inabadilisha umbali kati ya gurudumu la juu la jockey na sprockets. Vilima kwenye b-screw vitahamisha gurudumu la jockey mbali na the sprocket. The gap should be ~5mm.  See https://www.parktool.com/blog/repair-help/rear-derailleur-adjustment. The last section deals with B-screw adjustment.  You are correct that you should not change the chain length.

Mimi huwa nafikiria nishati ya Hamiltonian kama kuweka kiwango cha wakati kwa kile tunachohesabu kama 'hatua' za hesabu. Analog katika ugumu wa kawaida itakuwa juu ya kuamua kile tunachohesabu kama operesheni moja. Kitaalam tunaweza kuhesabu $ o (1) $ ndogo-njia kama operesheni moja, lakini kile tunachoamua seti the exact linear factors we will see in our runtime. Same with the norm of the Hamiltonian in adiabatic computation (and the specific universal finite gate set in quantum (or classical) circuits -- or changing from bits to trits in register model). The above approach of course produces only constant factors that don't matter.

Fikiria shida ifuatayo ambayo mimi huita »Uteuzi wa aina ya chini«: pembejeo: $ k $ seti za vectors kidogo, kila urefu wa $ n $ na nambari ya $ l $. Swali: Je! Inawezekana kuchagua vector moja kidogo kutoka kwa kila seti ya $ k $ kwamba hizi $ k $ bit vectors zilijumuisha busara ya safu kama matrix most $l$ distinct columns.   I was able to show that this problem is NP-complete. I now wonder about the parameterized complexity where $k$ is the parameter. Jamii tofauti za CS zina michakato tofauti, na ni ngumu kufanya uamuzi wazi na habari uliyopewa. Kulingana na maelezo yako tu ya uboreshaji kama "mantiki zaidi, inayosomeka zaidi, inayoweza kubadilika zaidi", haitastahili kufanikiwa kwa nadharia katika nadharia paper.   It ultimately depends on how significant the improvements really were, and how nontrivial. I should add that at least in theoretical computer science, authorship tends to be handed out somewhat more liberally than in more experimental subdisciplines.

Kernelization ni mfumo wa algorithms ya parameta kuchambua ufanisi wa algorithms ya kupunguza data. Kernelization ni algorithm ya wakati wa polynomial ambayo hubadilisha mfano wowote $ (x, k) $ ya shida iliyowekwa $ l $ kuwa mfano $ (x ', k') $ ya $ l $ kama hiyo $ (x, k) $ ni mfano wa ndio ikiwa tu ikiwa $ (x ', k') $ ni mfano wa ndio, $ | x '| \ le g (k) $ kwa kazi fulani $ g $, na $ k' \ LE H (K) $ kwa kazi fulani $ H $. Kazi $ G $ inaitwa saizi ya kernelization. Shida iliyowekwa parameta ni ya kudumu ya parameta ikiwa na tu ikiwa inakubali kernelization. The size of the kernel may, however, be super-polynomial. Generally, the aim is to show kernels with $g$ being as slowly growing as possible. Thus, a main goal in kernelization is to achieve problem kernels of polynomial size. References: Wikipedia page on kernelization Rodney G. Downey, Michael R. Fellows: Fundamentals of Parameterized Complexity. Texts in Computer Science, Springer 2013, ISBN 978-1-4471-5558-4, pp. I-SSS, 3-707 Marek Cygan, Fedor V. Fomin, Lukasz Kowalik, Daniel Lokshtanov, Dániel Marx, Marcin Pilipczuk, Michal Pilipczuk, Saket Saurabh: Parameterized Algorithms. Springer 2015, ISBN 978-3-319-21274-6, pp. 3-555

Nadhani - na tumaini - kwamba kila mwanafunzi wa sayansi ya kompyuta anakabiliwa na shida hii ambayo huhisi kama kitendawili. Ni mfano mzuri sana kwa tofauti ya kubadilika kwa maana ya TCS na inayoweza kushughulikiwa kwa maana ya vitendo. Mawazo yangu hapo zamani yalikuwa: "Ndio, ikiwa ningejua jibu, ni wazi kuwa ni ngumu. Lakini jinsi ya kujua?" Ujanja ni kujiondoa kutoka kwa udanganyifu kwamba lazima ujue kuwa $ \ pi $ ina mali hii au la. Kwa sababu hii, ni wazi (soma: IMHO), haiwezi kufanywa na mashine ya Kujaribu (kwa muda mrefu kama hatuna maarifa zaidi kuliko tunayo $ \ pi $). Consider your definition for computability: we say $f$ is (Turing-)computable if and only if  $\exists M \in TM : f_M = f$. That is you only have to show existence of an appropriate Turing machine, not give one. What you -- we -- try to do there is to compute the Turing machine that computes the required function. This is a way harder problem!  The basic idea of the proof is: I give you an infinite class of functions, all of them computable (to show; trivial here). I prove then that the function you are looking for is in that class (to show; case distinction here). q.e.d.

Mimi sio mtaalam juu ya nadharia ya ugumu na utaftaji wa pamoja. Nataka kujua ikiwa shida ifuatayo (au sawa) inajulikana katika fasihi ya kisayansi, na ikiwa unafikiria ni kamili. Asante mapema kwa msaada wako. Uingizaji: Vigezo viwili X na Y, ambavyo vinaweza kuwa sawa. n Wateja C1, C2, ... CN M Aina za Bidhaa M1, M2 ... mm Kuna vipande vya X vinavyopatikana kwa kila MI nzuri: kipande cha 1kg, kipande kingine cha 2kg, ...., kipande cha x kilo. Kila mteja anataka kununua idadi fulani ya bidhaa. Kwa mfano, mteja C1 anaweza kuwa na hamu ya kununua bidhaa M1, M4, M8 na M9. Mteja ameridhika ikiwa anaweza kupata bidhaa zote anazotaka to buy. In addition, the weights of the parts he was able to purchase must satisfy a constraint that I'll explain below.  Output: How many customers can be satisfied?  The constraint on the weights is as follows: Take for example the client C1 who is interested in buying goods M1, M4, M8 and M9. Assume that C1 was able to purchase all four goods. Let P1, P2, P3, P4 be the weights of the pieces he was able to buy. C1 is satisfied if $\sum_i  P_i -1 <Y$.    Edit: Note that the limit Y is common for all customers. The intuition behind the constraint is that we want to limit the number of pieces whose weight is not equal to 1kg.

Seti ya maneno juu ya alfabeti ya laini haina kiambishi ikiwa hakuna maneno mawili tofauti ambapo moja ni kiambishi cha kingine. Swali ni: Je! Ni nini ugumu wa kuangalia ikiwa lugha ya kawaida inayopewa kama NFA ina sehemu ndogo ya bure ya kiambishi awali? Jibu (kwa sababu ya Mikhail Rudoy, hapa hapa chini): Inaweza kufanywa kwa wakati wa polynomial, na nadhani hata katika NL. Kutoa jibu la Mikhail, acha $ (\ sigma, q_0, f, \ delta) $ iwe NFA ya pembejeo katika fomu ya kawaida (hakuna mabadiliko ya epsilon, trim), na wacha $ l [p, r] $ (resp. $ L [ p, r] $) kuwa lugha iliyopatikana kwa kuwa na $ $ $ kama hali ya awali na $ \ {r \} $ kama hali ya mwisho (resp. Jimbo $ p $ kama inital na seti $R$ as final). For a word $u$ let $u^\omega$ be the infinite word obtained by iterating $u$.  The following are equivalent:   The language $L[q_0,F]$ contains an infinite prefix-free subset. $\exists q \in Q$, $\exists u \in L[q,q]\smallsetminus\{\varepsilon\}$ $\exists v \in L[q,F]$ so that $v$ is not a prefix of $u^\omega$. $\exists q \in Q$ $L[q,q] \neq \{\varepsilon\}$ $\forall u \in L[q,q]$ $\exists v \in L[q,F]$ so that $v$ is not a prefix of $u^\omega$.   Proof:  3$\Rightarrow$2 trivial.  For 2$\Rightarrow$1, it suffices to see that for any $w \in L[q_0,q]$ we have that $w (u^{|v|})^* v$ is an infinite prefix-free subset of $L[q_0,F]$.  Finally, 1$\Rightarrow$3 is the "correctness" proof in Mikhail's answer.

Hakuna kitu bora kuliko $ \ mathbf {bpp}/\ maandishi {poly} = \ mathbf {p}/\ maandishi {poly} $ inajulikana. Kwa upande mwingine, matokeo bora yanajulikana katika mpangilio wa nafasi iliyofungwa. Fortnow and Klivans showed that $\mathbf{BPL} \subseteq \mathbf{L}/O(n)$ (see this paper for a refinement). It follows that $\mathbf{BPL}/O(n) = \mathbf{L}/O(n)$.

Ili kurahisisha hii kidogo, nitapuuza upinzani wa kupinga na kuvuta kwa aerodynamic, kwa hivyo kazi yote inafanywa kwa kuvunja. Pia, unapovunja ngumu, kuvunja mbele hufanya karibu kazi yote, kwa hivyo kupuuza kuvunja nyuma ili kurahisisha hali hiyo. Kusimamisha misa ya baiskeli + Rider = 100kg kasi = 10 m/s (36km/h, karibu 22.4mph) nishati ya kinetic = 0.5 m V^2 = 5000J msingi wa msingi wa chuma 180mm una uzito wa 150g na joto maalum la chuma ni karibu 0.5 J/gk (joules kwa digrii ya gramu), kwa hivyo kubadilisha 5KJ ya nishati ya kinetic kuwa joto kwenye rotor inapaswa kuongeza joto la rotor kwa digrii 67 (c), ikizingatiwa hakuna nguvu yoyote inayofyonzwa na pedi ya kuvunja, mwili wa caliper au kuvunja Fluid (sio ya kweli, lakini muhimu kutambua nafasi ya juu kwa rotor). Vipunguzi vya kudumisha kasi ya mara kwa mara kwenye mteremko hata, mabadiliko ya nguvu ya mvuto lazima iwe sawa na nishati ya joto iliyotolewa kwa kuvunja (pamoja na vyanzo vingine vya msuguano na kuvuta ambayo tunapuuza). Kushuka 1 kwa mteremko 10 kwa umbali wa 100m hutoa mabadiliko ya urefu wa 9.95m (sio 10m, kwa sababu umbali uko kando ya hypotenuse). Mvuto duniani ni karibu 9.8 m/s^2. Mabadiliko ya nishati = m g h = 100 * 9.8 * 9.95 = 9751J Hii itaongeza joto la rotor kwa digrii 130. Kuondoa joto na mipaka ya maarifa yangu mahesabu mawili hapo juu hayana muda kwa sababu sijaruhusu upotezaji wa joto wakati wa event; here are some of the complicating factors:   The friction creates a film of pad material on the rotor. This film insulates the rotor, but also is necessary for cohesive friction, which generates heat without consuming the pad material, but gives way to destructive friction as pressure increases. The heat is generated at two patches on either side of the rotor, not uniformly throughout the rotor material, so as the rotor turns through the contact patch, heat penetrates from the surface to the core of the rotor, then as the rotor leaves the contact patch, the surface is cooled proportionally to the surface-air temperature difference, and once the surface is colder than the core, heat moves from core to surface. Heat is also conducted parallel to the surface, from hotter to colder parts of the core. The airflow path length across the rotor is not consistent. The airflow around the rotor is turbulent due to the disruption caused by the leading part of the wheel and, for the upper aft part of the rotor, the fork leg and brake caliper.   Modelling heat in rotors is sufficiently complicated that it is a topic used in Engineering project assignments for university students, and the software typically used to perform the calculations is very expensive.  "Experimental and Numerical Thermal Analysis of Formula Student Racing Car Disc Brake Design", Manthan Vidiya1 and Balbir Singh, Manipal Institute of Technology. Published in Journal of Engineering Science and Technology Review 10(1)(2017)138-147   Example model "Heat Generation in a Disc Brake" for COMSOL Multiphysics:

Una $ \ mathbb {e} [y_i] = \ epsilon q (x_i) + (1- \ epsilon)/2 $ na $ 0 \ leq y_i \ leq 1 $, na wote $ y_i $ s kuwa huru. Kwa hivyo Chernoff -Hoeffding Bound inatoa $ $ \ mathbb {p} \ kushoto [\ kushoto | \ frac {1} {n} \ jumla -\ epsilon} 2 \ kulia | \ geq \ lambda \ kulia] \ leq 2 \ cdot e^{-2 \ lambda^2 n} $ $ kwa $ \ lambda> 0 $. Kuzidisha kwa $ 1/\ varepsilon $ kupata $ $ \ mathbb {p} \ kushoto [\ kushoto | \ frac {1} {n} \ jumla_ {i = 1}^n \ frac {1} kushoto (y_i - \frac{1-\epsilon}2\right)-q(x_i)\right| \geq \frac{\lambda}{\epsilon}\right] \leq 2 \cdot e^{-2\lambda^2 n}.$$ Set $\lambda=\sqrt{\log(2/\delta)/2n}$ and substitute in $q(x)=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^n q(x_i)$ to get $$\mathbb{P}\left[\left|\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^n \frac{1}{\epsilon}\left(y_i  - \frac{1-\epsilon}2\right)-q(x)\right| \geq \frac{\sqrt{\log(2/\delta)}}{\epsilon\sqrt{2n}}\right] \leq \delta.$$ Now "suppress" the $\delta$ parameter using big-O notation to get $$\left|\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^n \frac{1}{\epsilon}\left(y_i  - \frac{1-\epsilon}2\right)-q(x)\right| \leq O\left(\frac{1}{\epsilon\sqrt{n}}\right)$$ with high probability, as required.

Kwa miaka mingi nimetumia wote na kwa maoni yangu mkia mkia MTB na ujanja wa inchi 1.25 au mseto ndio njia ya kwenda. Unachopoteza kwa kasi ya juu unapata katika uimara. MTB ni bora zaidi kuchukua adhabu ya kusafiri kwa kila siku. Hakuna kitu cha kukasirisha zaidi kuliko kubadilisha zilizopo au kuchagua minyororo iliyofungwa wakati unapaswa kuwa tayari kazini. Seti ya kupanda kwa kilima / baa za mwisho hufanya tofauti kubwa na hukuruhusu adjust riding position. If you need extra speed, get a set of riding shoes with cleats or just old school toe clips.  In regards to the speed it really depends on the rider as much as it depends on the bike. I do frequently 30 to 50 miles social rides on the weekend and and I keep up on my 26" MTB. The only times I'm in real disadvantage is long gently sloping downhills where I simply don't have high enough gears.

Jibu: Ndio (hata kama $ i $ ni sehemu ndogo ya mfano wa $ \ phi $) acha $ r_ {| i} $ seti ya vifungu ambavyo vinapatikana kutoka $ f _ {\ phi} \ kikombe f _ {\ phi | i } $ kwa maazimio yote na maazimio yote 3 na subs ($ r_ {| i} $ ni kufungwa kwa kiwango cha 3 cha $ f _ {\ phi} \ kikombe f _ {\ phi | i} $). Kwa kuzingatia $ c $ kifungu kilichoonyeshwa na $ f _ {\ phi} $, inapatikana angalau sehemu moja ya $ r_ {| i} $ ambayo vifungu vinamaanisha $ C $. Jina $ r_c $ subset kama hiyo. Acha $ p (k) $ mali ifuatayo: Kwa $ C $ zote zilizoonyeshwa na $ f _ {\ phi} $ kwamba $ | c_ {| i} | \ le 3 $, $ [\ ipo r_c \ subseteq r_ {| i} $ kwamba $ | r_c | ] $ Hapa inaanza tena. Imepewa $ C $ iliyoonyeshwa na $ f _ {\ phi} $ kwamba $ | c_ {| i} | } $. $ k = 1 $. Ikiwa $ \ ipo r_c \ subseteq r_ {| i} / | r_c | = 1 $ kisha $ r_c = \ {d \} $ ($ d \ in f _ {\ phi} \ kikombe f _ {\ phi | $ c $) na $ c_ {| i} $ imetolewa na $ d_ {| i} \ in f _ {\ phi | i} $ (kumbuka kuwa kifungu chochote cha $ f _ {\ phi | i $ kinatolewa na wengine Kifungu cha $ g _ {\ phi | i} $). Kwa hivyo $ p (1) $. Tuseme $ p (k) $ kwa $ k \ ge1 $. Ikiwa $ \ ipo r_ {c} \ subseteq r_ {| i} $ kwamba $ | r_ {c} | F _ {\ phi} $ na $ | c |> 3 $) kisha tuseme $ c = (\ alpha \ beta \ gamma l_ {i}) $ ambapo $ \ alpha, \ beta, \ gamma $ ni maandishi ambayo hayajawekwa na $ I $ na $ l_ {i} $ ni sehemu ndogo ya fasihi yote hutathmini hadi 0 chini ya $ i (l_i \ neq \ varnothing) $, i.e $ c_ {| i} = (\ alpha \ beta \ gamma) $, na $ \ alpha, \ beta, \ gamma $ sio lazima tofauti. Ondoa kifungu $ d_ {i} $ kutoka $ r_ {c} $ kwamba $ | d_ {i | i} | Inayo halisi kutoka $ l_ {i} $ (kuna angalau kifungu kama hicho katika $ r_ {c} $ tangu $ l_i \ neq \ varnothing $) na $ | d_ {i | i} | \ leq 2 $. Saizi ya seti iliyobaki $ r_ {c} \ setMinus d_ {i} $ ni $ \ le k $. Ikiwa kifungu fulani $ c '= (\ alpha \ beta \ gamma l' _ {i}) $ imetajwa na $ r_ {c} \ setminus d_ {i} $ (ambapo $ l '_ {i} $ ni a $ Sehemu ndogo ya Fasihi zote zinatathmini hadi 0 chini ya $ i $) kisha $ | c '_ {| i} | = 3 $ na $ \ inapatikana r_ {c'} = r_ {c} \ setMinus d_ {i} \ subseteq r_ { | I} $ kama hiyo $ | r_ {c '} | \ le k $. Kwa $ p (k) $, $ c '_ {| i} = (\ alpha \ beta \ gamma) $ basi inasambazwa na kifungu fulani $ \ katika g _ {\ phi | i} $, inducing $ p (k+ 1) $ kwa $ C $. If $d_{i|I}$ contains $\bar \alpha$ or $\bar \beta$ or $\bar \gamma$ then $d_{i|I}$ is useless to imply [some clause subsuming] $c$. Then $R_{c}\setminus d_{i}$ implies $c$, inducing $P(k+1)$ as shown previously. If $d_{i|I}\in F_{\phi|I}$ subsumes $c_{|I}$ then $P(k+1)$ is satisfied for $c$.  If $d_{i|I}$ does not subsume $c_{|I}$ and does not contain $\bar \alpha$ or $\bar \beta$ or $\bar \gamma$ then either $d_{i|I}=(x)$ or $d_{i|I}=(ax)$ or $d_{i|I}=(xy)$, where $x$ and $y$ $\notin\{\alpha \beta \gamma \}$ and are not set by $I$, and $a \in\{\alpha \beta \gamma \}$.   If $d_{i|I}=(x)$ then $R_{c}\setminus d_{i}$ implies $(\bar{x}\alpha \beta \gamma L_{I})$ (recall that implying a certain clause $C$ means implying a clause which subsumes $C$). Since any resolution with $d_{i|I}=(x)$ as operand removes $\bar{x}$ from the other operand then no clause of $R_{c}\setminus d_{i}$ contains $\bar x$ (since $R_{c}\setminus d_{i} \subseteq R_{|I}$ which is the 3-limited closure of $F_{\phi}\cup F_{\phi|I}$). Then $R_{c}\setminus d_{i}$ implies $(\alpha \beta \gamma L_{I})$, inducing $P(k+1)$ as shown in Point (4).  If $d_{i|I}=(ax)$ then $R_{c}\setminus d_{i}$ implies $(\bar{x}\alpha \beta \gamma L_{I})$. Replace $\bar{x}$ by $a$ in each possible clause of $R_{c}\setminus d_{i}$ (if the new clause is subsumed by some clause in $R_{|I}$, keep the subsuming clause instead. Anyway, the replacing clause is in $R_{|I}$). Name $R_{c,d_{i}}$ the resulting set ($R_{c,d_{i}}\subseteq R_{|I}$). Then $R_{c,d_{i}}$ implies $(\alpha \beta \gamma L_{I})$, inducing $P(k+1)$ as above. If $d_{i|I}=(xy)$ then $R_{c}\setminus d_{i}$ implies $(\bar{x}\alpha \beta \gamma L_{I})$ and $(\bar{y}\alpha \beta \gamma L_{I})$. Replace $\bar{x}$ by $y$ in each possible clause of $R_{c}\setminus d_{i}$ (as above, if the new clause is subsumed by some clause in $R_{|I}$, keep the subsuming clause instead). Name $R_{c,d_{i}}$ the resulting set ($R_{c,d_{i}}\subseteq R_{|I}$). Then $R_{c,d_{i}}$ implies $({y}\alpha \beta \gamma L_{I})$. Since it implies also $(\bar{y}\alpha \beta \gamma L_{I})$ then it implies the resolvent $(\alpha \beta \gamma L_{I})$, inducing $P(k+1)$.    By this recurrence, any clause $\in$ the 3-closure of $F_{\phi |I}$ is subsumed by some clause $\in G_{\phi|I}$ (the other way holds as well). Then $G_{\phi|I}$ corresponds to the 3-closure of $F_{\phi |I}$.

Kutoka kwa uelewa wangu, bandari hiyo ni bandari ya fidia ya shinikizo. Mafuta huhifadhiwa muhuri na membrane, ambayo unaweza kuwa umevunjika kwa sababu ya kujaza kupita kiasi. Kuna a small port in the side of the master cylinder that connects the reservoir to the cylinder. When you actuate the lever, the piston travels past the port, allowing the system to build up pressure. When you release the lever, the port opens up again and does any necessary compensation.

Hapana, sio rasmi. Hati ya kihistoria ni https://bike.shimano.com/en-eu/product/component/grx-11-speed/rd-rx810.html ambayo inasema mfano hakuna RD-RX810 Series GRX 11-Speed Low Sprocket_max. 34t Low Sprocket_min. 30t max. Tofauti ya mbele 17t Juu Sprocket_min na Max. 11t Jumla ya Uwezo 40T Kwa hivyo kiwango cha chini na cha juu cha jino kwenye kaseti yako ni 11. Hiyo inasema lazima iwe jino 11. Mwisho mkubwa, kiwango cha chini ni 30 na kiwango cha juu ni jino 34. Kwa kuwa jino lako 40 linalotaka ni zaidi, ni nje ya spec. Je! Unaweza kuifanya ifanye kazi? 40 ni mbali kutoka 34, na wakati unaweza kuisukuma hadi 36 bila suala, 38 inapata IFFY na 40 haiwezekani. Inawezekana na extender ya derailleur kama jino la tanpan au mbwa mwitu, lakini basi unaelekeza mahali pengine. Soma juu ... kando kuna sehemu ya swali juu ya hii itafanya kazi na mnyororo mmoja. Ningependa kudhani kuwa hauzidi uwezo, kwa hivyo kwa jina lake no worse than simply riding on one chainring of a double.  You're only using 34-11=23 teeth of capacity.  However the rated "40T capacity" is not all in the rear cassette, its up to 23 teeth in the cassette and up to 17 teeth in the chainring difference.  Upshot 42:34 is not a terrible gear for climbing, but its nowhere near the sub-1:1 range like a triple could give, and not approaching what a compact double could do.  All depends what you want to ride up and how fast. Answer You want a RD-RX812 which has a 40 or 42 tooth low gear rating.  That would let you use 42:40 as per your question.  You need an 11 speed chain as well, and an 11 speed GRX shifter that suits your bars and brakes.  Downside, 42:11 isn't going to spin you fast on a downhill or a tailwind, but they're not as common with offroad riding so less of an issue. I'd consider going 42:42 cos the meaning of life at both ends of your transmission is fantastically nerdy.

Angalia Bibilia ya Mafunzo ya Baiskeli ya Joe Friel: Inashughulikia kwa undani mambo yote ya mafunzo kwa baiskeli, pamoja na mafunzo ya nguvu. Ushauri wake kwa ujumla unaenda kinyume na majibu mengine mawili yaliyopewa hadi sasa. Anaorodhesha mazoezi maalum pamoja na mpango wa nguvu katika kitabu (Sura ya 12), lakini kanuni za jumla ni chache na zinaweza kutolewa hapa kitenzi: Sheria ya 1: Kuzingatia waendeshaji wakuu. Waziri Mkuu ndio vikundi vikubwa vya misuli ambavyo hufanya kazi kuu kwenye baiskeli. Wahamiaji wakuu wa baiskeli ni quadriceps, viboko, na gluteals. Wakati kuwa na deltoids zilizokuzwa vizuri zinaweza kuonekana nzuri, ni nzuri tu kwa kuinua baiskeli yako-sio harakati za kawaida katika mbio za barabarani. Sheria ya 2: Zuia usawa wa misuli. Baadhi ya majeraha ya kawaida kwa waendeshaji hutokana na usawa kati ya misuli ambayo lazima ifanye kazi kwa maelewano kutoa harakati. Kwa mfano, ikiwa quadriceps ya nyuma iliyo nje ya paja imeandaliwa sana na jamaa ya medial hapo juu na ndani ya goti, jeraha la goti linawezekana. Sheria ya 3: Tumia mazoezi ya pamoja wakati wowote inapowezekana. Curls za biceps ni zoezi la pamoja moja, linalojumuisha tu kiwiko cha pamoja. Hii ndio aina ya wajenzi wa mazoezi ya misuli do. Squats, a basic cycling exercise, include three joints—the hip, knee, and ankle. This comes closer to simulating the dynamic movement patterns of the sport of cycling and also reduces time in the gym.  Rule 4: Mimic the positions and movements of cycling as closely as possible. Position your hands and feet when lifting weights so they are in similar positions to when you are on the bike. On a leg-press sled, for example, the feet should be placed about the same width as the pedals. You don't ride with your feet spread 18 inches (45 cm) and your toes turned out at 45 degrees. Another example: When holding the bar for seated rows, position your hands as as you would on handlebars.  Rule 5: Always include the "core"—abdominals and lower back. The forces applied by your arms and legs must pass through the core of your body. If it is weak, much of the force is dissipated and lost. As you climb or during a sprint, it takes a strong core to transfer more of the force generated by pulling against the handlebars to the pedals. Weak abdominal and back muscles make for wimpy climbing and sprinting.

Chainline is the least problem here, thus.

Hapa kuna njia nyingine ya kufikiria juu ya swali, ambayo haitaja aina au kazi za mpangilio wa juu. Kama Andrej alivyosema, tafsiri au encodings hufanya hesabu nyingi. Kwa kweli, hii haiwezi kuepukwa wakati wa kulinganisha mifano lakini tunaweza kuuliza ikiwa tafsiri mbili n.k. Kutoka kwa Lambda-calculus hadi Mashine ya Kujaribu na kurudi tena, ni dhahiri au inayoweza kushughulikiwa ndani ya mfano wa asili. Kwa mfano, kwamba kutoka kwa Lambda-calculus hadi mashine za Kujaribu (i.e Kleene-algebra inayolingana kwenye nambari za asili) na nyuma sio ya Lambda-kufafanuliwa, kwani vinginevyo usawa wa aina ya kawaida ungekuwa dhahiri. Tazama @Article {JAY201976, kichwa = "hesabu ya ndani na kazi za mpangilio wa juu", jarida = "Sayansi ya Kompyuta ya nadharia", kiasi = "768", kurasa = "76 - 90", mwaka = "2019", issn = "0304-3975", doi = "doi.org/10.1016/j.tcs.2019.02.016", url = "sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0304397519301227", author = "Barry Jay" In recent work I have shown that my tree calculus supports meaningful translations to and from a novel lambda-calculus called VA-calculus. The double translation to VA-calculus is not definable but the double translation to tree calculus is. The evaluation rules for these combinational calculi have been given in recent tweets by me. The larger story is developed in a finished monograph "Reflective Programs in Tree Calculus" which will be published by Springer-Nature. The proofs have been formally verified in a Coq package called coq-tree-calculus available from GitHub. https://github.com/barry-jay-personal/tree-calculus. The frontmatter of the book and the tweets can be found there as tweets_on_trees.pdf

Faida dhahiri ni upinzani wa kuchomwa kuna shida kadhaa: gharama ya kupinga kupinga gharama ya kupanda kuna viwango kadhaa vya upinzani wa kuchomwa na ukanda wa Kevlar sio njia pekee. Wacha nikuambie hadithi. Baada ya miaka miwili kwenye tairi iliyo na upinzani wa wastani wa kuchomwa ilipata gorofa yangu ya kwanza na ilibidi nitembee nyumbani. Niliingia kwenye mtandao na nikanunua tairi sugu zaidi ya kuchomwa niliweza kupata kupuuza mambo mengine yote. Ni nzito mara mbili kama tairi ya zamani (na huhisi mara mbili nzito), dhahiri zaidi ya kupinga, mtego mdogo, mtego mbaya katika mvua, na safari kali. Sipendi. Ikiwa nitapata kujaa kwa miaka miwili ikilinganishwa na moja haifai. Hata matairi ya mbio kawaida huja na upinzani fulani wa kuchomwa. Matairi ya majaribio ya wakati hayana. Njia za kupinga kupinga vifaa sugu kama vile Kevlar. Kuna vifaa vingine kama Duraskin na Bara. Nyenzo zinaweza kuwa kwenye kamba ya kukanyaga tu au ni pamoja na kando ya barabara. Inaweza kuwa na mchanganyiko kama ganda ngumu ya gator. Material in tread strip Not material specifically designed for puncture resistance - more material.  Rubber or SmartGuard. Make the glass or thorn travel further.  An example is the Marathon Plus HS 440. Harder rubber Bounce glass and thorns off and also slow them down if they do penetrate    Pick your level of protection   Puncture resistant material in tread only This adds puncture resistance at a very small performance impact.  Comes in all but very very cheap tires.  Most racing tires even have this. Puncture resistant material(s) in tread and sidewall Adds even more puncture resistance at still a very small performance impact.  At this level it is more just a cost thing.  A cheap tire is not going to have this extra material.  An expensive tire will have better puncture resistance, performance, and ride compared to a  cheap tire. More material (e.g. rubber) Adds more puncture resistance but now you get into noticeable performance impacts.    Harder rubber Harsher ride and less traction.   Pick a tire for a combination of performance, ride, puncture resistance, and price.

Unahitaji ama mfupi (shina) [https://bicycles.stackexchange.com/a/270/19705] (huleta baa karibu) au kuinua shina. Umri uliopewa sana unaonyesha shina yake ya quill, na itaonekana kama hii ndani. Rudi nyuma kwenye bolt ya clamp (inaweza kuwa tundu la hex au kichwa cha bolt) zamu kadhaa, na kisha gonga kwa upole juu ya juu ya bolt ili kufungua clamp chini ndani ya bomba lako la kichwa. Usifanye kabisa isipokuwa ikakamatwa na kutu na lazima upate grumpy. Mara tu huru, vuta shina juu a bit and retighten.  Go for a test ride and see how it feels.     WARNING Be mindful of the minimum insertion marks and obey them.     Once you're happy, tighten up the clamp bolt properly after checking the stem and front wheel are in line.  Use a ruler - don't just eyeball it.   Also avoid overtightening the clamp bolt.  If adding height doesn't help, you'll need a shorter stem, or possibly bars with a little more swept-back and some more uplift.  This starts costing money though.

Tuseme nina shida ya eneo la kituo na gharama zote za huduma 0 (au infinity (haswa gharama za huduma sio metric)) kwamba edges $ ij $ ambayo kituo cha $ i $ kinaweza huduma mteja $ j $ na gharama 0 (pamoja na Vifaa na wateja) huunda grafu ya sayari. Je! Ni nini kiwango cha juu cha umoja wa LP kama hiyo? Hii ni hasa iliyowekwa kifuniko na kizuizi cha ziada ambacho tukio la kuweka kipengee graph (  that is a graph with nodes  $v_S$ for every set $S$ and nodes $v_e$ for every element $e$ and the edges $v_S v_e$ for elements $e$ and sets $S$ for which $e \in S$) is planar. Katika "mantiki ya kidunia", na R.Alur na A.Henziger, wanaanzisha upanuzi wa mantiki ya muda mfupi na kufungia $ x. baadaye kulinganisha na wengine. Mfano wa mfano kutoka kwa karatasi ni $ $ \ sanduku x. (P \ to \ almasi y. (Q \ ardhi y \ le x + 10)) $ $ ambayo inamaanisha kuwa wakati wowote $ p $ inashikilia, $ q $ lazima hatimaye kushikilia Ndani ya alama 10 za wakati. Mantiki hii imethibitishwa kuwa kamili-kamili kwenye karatasi hapo juu. Kwa kuwa karatasi ni very old, I'm wondering which developments have been done on this logic.  Specifically, I'm asking if it has been proved whether this logic augmented with LTL past operators is still EXPSPACE-complete, as is the case for classic LTL+past which remains PSPACE-complete as the future-only version.  I've found something by searching for "freeze quantifier" but recent works such as this paper talk about further extensions with registers that I'm not interested about (or maybe I am but I'm misunderstanding).  So is this logic augmented with past operators still EXPSPACE-complete?

Inategemea kile unataka kufanya na habari hiyo. Ikiwa unataka tu kuona eneo lako kwenye skrini na hakuna chochote zaidi, basi hakuna akaunti ya mkondoni inahitajika. Walakini ikiwa unataka kushinikiza kurekodi/eneo lako kwa huduma kama Strava nk, basi utahitaji akaunti nao. Mtengenezaji wa kifaa atataka habari yako ya kusajili kifaa, na dhamana. Hilo litakuwa jambo tofauti, lakini kufanya hii kunaweza kukupa ufikiaji wa firmware na sasisho za ramani. Mwishowe, ikiwa kifaa chako kinataka ufikiaji wa mtandao lakini haina sim ya ndani ya rununu, inaweza pair with a cellphone via bluetooth etc, to get internet access.  This is often done through an app on the phone.  Or you have to wait till you get home in range of a wireless AP to upload the device's recording.    I don't have a garmin personally, I use an android phone with ANT+ to talk with a HRM and a Cadence sensor.  The phone has a data internet link when in-range, and also has wireless ethernet when I'm at home.  I need a strava account, and a cellphone account, and a working internet connection at home.

Kufafanua juu ya maoni niliyoyatoa mapema: tunashangaza, na baadhi ya jasho hilo litagonga baiskeli yako au mikoba yako. Kama ilivyoelezwa mahali pengine, unataka kuifuta baiskeli yako, na unapaswa kuzingatia aina fulani ya kufunika kwa bomba la juu. Kwa kweli, huyu sio mkufunzi yenyewe anayeharibu baiskeli yako. Walakini, nje, unasonga kupitia hewa, ambayo hupunguza joto nyingi. Sina hakika kuwa hii imekuwa ikisomwa kisayansi, lakini Hekima ilionekana kuwa baridi ya ndani ni karibu kila wakati sio nzuri kuliko baridi unayopata kutoka kwa kupanda nje, isipokuwa ukiwekeza katika mashabiki wengi wenye nguvu. Kwa hivyo, jasho la kuteleza ni matokeo yasiyoweza kuepukika ya mafunzo ya ndani. Ikiwa unatumia sura ya chuma, inapaswa kuwa dhahiri kuwa hii ni mbaya. Ikiwa una sura ya kaboni, utakuwa na vifaa vya aluminium kwa vitu kama wakubwa wa ngome ya chupa. Jasho linaweza kuwezesha kutu ya galvanic kwa wakati. Picha hapa chini inatolewa tena kutoka kwa chapisho la Facebook na Raoul Luescher, mtaalam wa ukarabati wa kaboni wa Australia. Alifafanua vitu vyeupe vya poda kama aluminium kimsingi hutengana kwa sababu ya kutu. Inawezekana pia kwa muafaka wa aluminium au vifaa vya kutuliza kutoka kwa jasho katika hali zingine. Chapisho hili la Jukwaa la RoadBikeReview lina picha tatu, mbili ambazo zimetolewa hapa chini. Mpanda farasi alisema kwamba walikuwa wamepitia mfano huu wa mfano huu wa miaka mitatu. Nakala hii ya Wiley Metal inasema kwamba wakati alumini mbichi kawaida has a protective oxide layer forming immediately, sodium chloride or other chloride salts can attack that oxide layer. To protect against that, we normally paint or anodize aluminum components, and all aluminum handlebars are indeed anodized. This increases the depth of the oxide layer and I believe it also makes it porous enough to accept dyes. Most handlebars are dyed black, and I think they're also covered with a clear coat. However, when mounting your shifters on your bars, you may introduce surface scratches that expose the oxide layer. The poster above may not be typical, e.g. they might perspire a lot more and a lot saltier* than average. However, for this reason, it's worth changing your bar tape every so often, just so you can check the status of the handlebars, and perhaps clean off accumulated salt deposits if there are any. *While not directly related to the original question, you do need to replenish electrolytes during endurance activity. Individuals do vary in how salty their perspiration is. If you notice yourself craving salty foods after or during a ride, you should strongly consider getting some electrolyte supplements if you don't already use them. They needn't be used on every ride, but the benefit can be substantial on longer rides, especially in the heat. If you figure that your sweat is saltier than your peers, it might also be worth checking up on your handlebars even if you don't do indoor cycling.

Nina Shimano Deore FC-M591-S (fedha) kwenye baiskeli yangu ya utalii. Ilikuja na SM-BB52. Nilinunua pia BB-MT800 kwenye hisa yangu ya sehemu za vipuri. Sijaweka BB-MT800 kwa sababu SM-BB52 bado haijashindwa. Siwezi kusema chochote juu ya ubora wa jamaa kati ya SM-BB52 na BB-MT800, kwani sijaweka BB-MT800 bado (na kwa hivyo haijashindwa na kwa hivyo sina takwimu zake ndefu), na kwa sababu Sijasababisha kutofaulu kwa SM-BB52 bado kwa hivyo sina takwimu ndefu kwa hiyo. Nilichukua BB-MT800 kwenye hisa yangu ya sehemu za vipuri kulingana na bei yake. Kwa maoni yangu haionekani kuwa na busara kununua bei nafuu part than BB-MT800 because to install the part it requires some amount of labor (I have to remove and install the crankset, and not only that -- my touring bike has a chainguard and that also needs to be removed and installed). Because labor has a high value, it makes sense to use that labor to install a high-grade part rather than a low-grade part. The FC-M591-S came with a cheap bottom bracket, but if this wasn't the case, I probably would have bought a more expensive BB than the SM-BB52 in the first place. The plastic adapter TL-FC25 seems to be included in the box. I have TL-FC32 but the plastic adapter can also be used with the TL-FC36.

Kuna nadharia chache, haswa katika nadharia ya picha na utaftaji wa pamoja, ambao mara nyingi hujulikana kama tabia nzuri. Kwa kawaida huweka mali katika $ np \ cap co-np $, kwa kuonyesha kuwa mali inashikilia, au sivyo kuna kizuizi fulani kilichotambuliwa ambacho kinazuia kushikilia. Mara nyingi huwasilishwa kama nadharia za min-max, angalia shida za uboreshaji wa swali la mapema na tabia nzuri, lakini hakuna algorithm ya wakati wa polynomial hapa kuna mifano miwili ya kitamaduni ya tabia nzuri: grafu ya bipartite ama ina ukubwa wa $ k $, au nyingine Kuna chini ya $ k $ vertices ambayo inashughulikia kingo zote. Uwepo wa kifuniko kama hicho ni kikwazo kidogo ambacho hakijumuishi kulinganisha. Ikiwa kizuizi hiki hakipo, kulinganisha lazima iwepo, hii ndio sehemu isiyo ya kawaida, inayojulikana kama Theorem ya Konig. Ama kuna mtiririko wa $ S-T $ wa thamani $ F $ kwenye grafu ya mtiririko, au sivyo kuna $ S-T $ iliyokatwa na uwezo chini ya $ F $. Tena, uwepo wa kata kama hiyo ni kikwazo kidogo, kwani wakati huo mtiririko hauwezi kupita. Sehemu isiyo ya kawaida ni kwamba kukosekana kwa kizuizi tayari kunahakikisha uwepo wa mtiririko wa thamani $ f $, ambayo ni sawa na max Flow Min Cut Theorem.    What I find a curious feature in these (and many other) results is that they show a well visible  asymmetry in the proof hardness between the two directions of the equivalence. Usually, it is easy, or even trivial, to prove that the obstacle excludes the considered property. On the other hand, it is much harder to prove that the easy/trivial obstacle is the only obstacle, in the sense that once it is not there, the property must hold.   I am not aware of  a good explanation why this type of asymmetry is so common. It does not appear a priori necessary. Note: do not get misled by the fact that the above examples are both special cases of linear programming duality. There are other examples that have nothing to do with linear programming.     Question: Do you know any good characterization that does not fall in this category? (Admittedly, it is vaguely defined, but perhaps the idea got through.) In other words, I am looking for a theorem that puts a property in $NP\cap co-NP$, by capturing all possible obstacles of the property, but they are not all easy/trivial obstacles.

Hapana, kwa kadiri ninavyojua, hakuna mifano ambayo hutumia nadharia ya kamba. Kwa kuzingatia kwamba nadharia za uwanja wa quantum zinaonekana kuwa rahisi kwa wakati wa polynomial na kompyuta ya kiasi (Jordan, Lee, na Preskill, 2012), mfumo pekee wa nguvu zaidi wa mwili ungekuwa mvuto wa quantum. Hii ni kwa sababu wanafizikia kwa ujumla wanaamini kuwa nadharia ya uwanja wa quantum inatoa maelezo bora ya takriban of the universe if gravity is neglected; however, general relativity seems incompatible with quantum mechanics. Thus, to get a full description of the universe, we need a theory of quantum gravity.  Many physicists believe this theory is given by string theory; however, physicists currently don't understand string theory well enough to use it as a basis for a model of computation.

Kwa kweli ni Martone. Walakini, ikiwa naweza kupendekeza, usinunue baiskeli hii, imejengwa kwa kiwango cha chini kabisa cha viwango vya ubora. Ikiwa unapenda integrated bar/basket, you can get one from copenhagen parts. This could be paired to any step-through-framed bike, 99.9% of which will be of a higher quality than a Martone.

Natafuta lugha ambazo "labda sio za muktadha" lakini hatuwezi (dis) kudhibitisha kwa kutumia mbinu zinazojulikana za kawaida. Je! Kuna uchunguzi wa hivi karibuni juu ya somo au sehemu ya shida ya wazi kutoka kwa mkutano wa hivi karibuni? Labda hakuna lugha nyingi ambazo hazijulikani kuwa CF, kwa hivyo ikiwa unajua moja unaweza pia kuichapisha kama jibu. Mfano ambao nimepata ni: lugha inayojulikana ya maneno ya zamani $ q = \ {w \ katikati w \ neq u^i (| u |> 1) \} $ (kuna a whole nice recent book on it: Context-Free Languages and Primitive Words) the Base-k representations of the co-domain of a polynomial (see question "Base-k representations of the co-domain of a polynomial - is it context-free?" on cstheory, which perhaps has been solved by domotorp, see his preprint)   Note: as showed by Aryeh in his answer you can build a whole class of such languages if you "link" a language to an unknown conjecture about the (non)finiteness or (non)emptiness of some sets (e.g. $L_{Goldbach} = \{ 1^{2n} \mid 2n$  cannot be expressed as a sum of two primes$\}$). I'm not quite interested in such examples.

Kwa bahati mbaya huwezi kufanya hivyo. Cogset na kibadilishaji lazima iwe na "umbali" sawa, au kwa usahihi zaidi, umbali sawa wa baadaye (kwenye pulley) kwa kila lenght ya cable iliyovutwa (kwenye kibadilishaji). Unapoenda kutoka kwa kasi 7 hadi 8, umbali kati ya cogs ni sawa (kwa sababu ganda la FreeHub ni refu), kwa hivyo unaweza kutumia kibadilishaji 7 na cogset 8 na gia moja haiwezi kufikiwa; Lakini unapoenda kutoka kwa kasi ya 8 hadi 9 kwenye kibadilishaji, umbali unaotarajiwa kati ya mabadiliko ya cogs (kwa sababu ganda la FreeHub kwa kasi 8, 9 na 10 ni sawa). Halafu unahitaji cogset ya kasi 9 pia, ili kila mabadiliko yatahusiana na umbali sahihi wa harakati za baadaye katika derailer. Ikiwa utahama kutoka 9 hadi 10, shida hiyo hiyo hufanyika. Hiyo ni potofu kind of programmed obsolescence, in my opinion, since even cranksets end up being incompatible due to the chain being narrower and narrower... (look for the Sheldon Brown "Nanodrive" system).  So the bottomline is: if you want to replace shifters, you'll have to replace the cogset, and probably the chain and cranks. I would not advise you to do so only for the sake of shifter change. Consider doing it only as a last resouce.  (I for one never changed to the 9+ speeds framework. I have 5 bikes in current use, all of them with the "7/8 speed framework", and I can easily find spare parts like cogs. My 7 speed shifter (a very old Alivio) still works fine, and it seems to me it is very rare for the shifter to have a poor working only because it got old).

Hivi majuzi nilipata mkufunzi wa Smart wa TACX Flux 2 (kwa sababu Lockdown) na niliamua kupata kaseti mpya na mnyororo pia, kwani sitakuwa nikifanya safari yoyote wakati wowote na ningependa kuweka kila kitu kizuri na safi ndani ya nyumba. Niliweka kaseti kwenye mkufunzi, nikaangalia nilikuwa nikitumia adapta za kulia kwa kaseti na QR, na kisha nikapima mnyororo mpya dhidi ya ile ya zamani (ni kasi sawa ya KMC 9), kuhakikisha walikuwa sawa. Kisha nikaweka mnyororo na kiungo kilichotolewa haraka, kuhakikisha kuwa inaendeshwa kwa njia sahihi kupitia magurudumu ya jockey. Walakini, sasa ninapata droning wazi kabisa, kelele za kusaga na vibration inayoonekana wakati kwenye pete ndogo 3. Kelele karibu disappears when in lower gears. The shifting fine though, and I can get shift in all gears. I have no idea what can be wrong and it feels almost like the chain has a hard time slotting into the teeth of the chain rings. Almost like the each roller slightly hits every tooth before grabbing on. If I had to describe it in an onomatopea, it would be a grindy "RRRrRrrrrrrRRrrrRrRrrrRr" What could be the cause of this? Is it just because the chain and cassette both need to be bedded in? Is it lubrication? ** UPDATE ** I finally managed to ride the bike outside and cannot reproduce the same noise or vibration. It seems that the issue is with the bike one the trainer.
Kunyunyizia nywele hufanya kazi vizuri, lubricates wakati wet, sticks when it dries.

Uzoefu wangu kutoka msimu wa baridi uliopita ni kwamba ningeweza kuendelea kusonga mbele kwa theluji iliyoanguka hadi karibu 6 "= 15cm lakini ilichukua juhudi kubwa, hata zaidi ikiwa matairi yako yanaishia kupasuka kupitia puddles waliohifadhiwa under the snow.  There were sections where I had to pedal hard just to keep moving even down some normally fast downhill sections.  It's great fun - but maybe don't stray too far from home on your first outing.

Ikiwa ufa uko kwenye kitanda cha kuongea, na haujaenea kwa upande wa mdomo, labda haitalipuka mara moja (ikiwa iko kando ya barabara, shinikizo la tairi linaweza kusababisha kupasuka, ambayo karibu itakufanya ajali). Walakini, kuna nafasi nzuri ambayo aliongea hatimaye atavuta kwenye mdomo, na kuna also the fact that once aluminum starts to fatigue and crack, the damage tends to spread relatively quickly, which means the rim could fail on you entirely, probably without any additional warning.  You didn't say when you next planned to visit the LBS, but I'd recommend taking care of it within a week or two at the most.

Derailleur ilibuniwa vibaya kama vifaa vya Argenti vilivyopendekeza. Ili kupunguza toe nje ya hii braze-on derailleur screw bolt msaada (bolt c kwenye ukurasa wa 11, 2mm Allen Key) na kurekebisha tena derailleur kwenye mlima wake. Wakati huo nilikuwa na uwezo to screw in the L-screw again and thust he cable-pull-angle was improved. Now shifiting to the big chainring is working fine again.  To reproduce you may need to decrease the gear cable tension to allow the derailleur to move away from the chainring towards the frame.

Nina baiskeli ya barabarani ambayo mimi hutumia zaidi kwa utalii (safari za siku 2-3) na safari yangu ya kila siku (~ 25km). Imejaa Shimano 2300 (2013) 3 x 10 kikundi. Najua sio bora zaidi au nyepesi, lakini kwa madhumuni yangu imenitumikia vizuri. Nilivunja tu derailleur ya nyuma. Sera yangu ni kila wakati kuchukua nafasi ya sehemu na zile zenye ubora sawa au bora. Shida yangu ni kwamba sehemu zenye kasi 8 zinakuwa chini na hazina kawaida kwa baiskeli za barabara, kwa hivyo kununua bora or equivalent parts for the 2300 is becoming difficult (I live in Singapore).  Is it worth it to upgrade to a complete higher tier groupset like the current Tiagra? My hope is that with this change I can access the market of 10 X 3 speed components and have room to upgrade part by part later if I want to.  Would I need to change more parts than the ones included (derailleurs, shifters, cassette, crankset, BB) other than the chain if my bicycle already handles 2300?

Hapana, lahaja iko katika P: Kwa kila kipengee $ x_i \ katika x $ pata seti $ a_ {x_i} $ ya tritules "inayoweza kufikiwa" kutoka $ x_i $: anza na tatu zilizo na $ x_i $ a_ {x_i} = \ {(x, y, z) \ mid x = x_i \} $ iteratively ongeza kwa $ a_ {x_i} $ tatu zote ambazo zinashiriki angalau kitu kimoja na tatu tayari kwa $ $ $ ikiwa $ e \ setMinus a_ { x_i} $ ni suluhisho na pia kwa kila mara tatu $ (x, y, z) \ katika $ $ ikiwa $ e \ setMinus (a_ {x_i} \ setMinus \ {(x, y, z) \}) $ ni $ Suluhisho (ondoa mara tatu kutoka $ A_ {x_i} $); Ikiwa sio suluhisho endelea na $ x_i $ inayofuata (hatua ya 1.) ikiwa hakuna suluhisho linalopatikana, repeat the same algorithm 2–3 above "scanning" $y_i \in Y$ and checking $A_{y_i}$ if no solution is found, repeat the same algorithm 2–3 above "scanning" $z_i \in Z$ and checking $A_{z_i}$   To prove that  it is correct note that each $A_{x_i}$ contains at most one element of the solution $M$ of the 3DM:   by your variation constrait $E \setminus M$ is contained in at least one of the $A_{x_i},A_{y_i},A_{z_i}$, suppose $A_{x_i}$: $E \setminus M \subseteq A_{x_i}$; furthermore $M \cap A_{x_i}$ must contain at most one triple from $A_{x_i}$, otherwise the 3DM constraint “covers each element of $X$, $Y$ and $Z$ exactly once” would be violated

Sema una maelezo ya OS-huru kwa majina ya faili. Majina ya faili ni nyeti, na wacha tuseme hayawezi kuwa zaidi ya herufi 200, na haziwezi kuwa na: au / kwa jina. Sasa sema unataka kutekeleza maelezo haya katika C kwenye mifumo tofauti ya uendeshaji (matoleo tofauti ya Linux na Darwin, sio Windows kwa sasa). Wacha tuseme kwa sababu ya hoja, inageuka kwenye mfumo fulani wa uendeshaji (mfumo wa uendeshaji "A"), ambayo pia huwezi kutumia | Katika jina la faili. Kweli, haukukamata hii katika maalum yako hapo awali. Swali ni, je! Unagunduaje hii kabla ya kuingia katika kesi hii? Katika mizunguko (kutoka kwa uelewa wangu), unaweza kutumia "kuangalia mfano" kuchunguza kiatomati majimbo yote ya mfumo, kubaini kesi za makali ambazo hazijashughulikia. Hiyo inafanya sense for relatively simple state machines like logic circuits. But what about this case with file names?  How would you generate file names, and try to save the file on that operating system, so it can discover these implementation errors, without having to generate every possible string up to 200 characters in length?  How do you verify that the implementation of the spec on operating system "A" is valid? The model checker would have to somehow randomly construct a file name using the | character, and then hit an error. Or maybe I am misunderstanding model checking, and what this really is is automatic testing.  What I'm wondering is, how do you account for these types of cases in advance using formal methods? What are the general techniques or topics to start looking into?

Ndio, inafanya kazi. Niliendesha kitovu cha kambi na kaseti na Shimano Duraace vibadilishaji na derailleurs bila shida. Chain kawaida ilikuwa Sram au Shimano. Kasi 9 is wonderfully versatile in this regard! Just make sure your rear derailleur hanger is straight. That tends to exaggerate tolerance discrepancies more than anything else.

Nimekuja tu USA (eneo la Bay) na nimepata baiskeli kwenda chuo kikuu. Kwa kuwa mpya mahali hapa niliendelea kujiuliza ni kwanini wakati mwingine lazima nisubiri kwa muda mrefu kwa taa ya kijani ili kugeuka kushoto, halafu gari inakuja na ishara inabadilika kuwa kijani kwa sekunde kumi. Leo nilingoja taa ya kijani kibichi five minutes and it did not come, since there were no cars in my lane. I started thinking I was insane, but then found this: How do Traffic Lights Notice Bicyclists? Sure enough, there are cameras in the intersection.  So how do people deal with this? Wait for a car? Turn on the red light? Use the pedestrian style of making left turns? Wave to the camera?

Hii ni uwanja mzima wa utafiti! Kwa ujumla, huwezi kuhakikisha kukomeshwa kwa $ r \ kikombe \ {l \ kuliarrow r \} $ kwa kuchunguza tu $ l \ kulia r $ na ufahamu kwamba $ r $ inasitisha. Hakika, hata kama $ l \ kuliaRrow r $ hisa hakuna alama za kazi na $ r $ unaweza kuanzisha kutokuwa na malipo! Hapa kuna mfano maarufu wa Toyama. Chukua mifumo ifuatayo: $ $ F (0,1, x) \ kuliaRrow f (x, x, x) $ $ na $ $ p (x, y) \ kulia x $ $ $ $ p (x, y) \ kulia y $ $ Kila mfumo mmoja mmoja unamalizika, na utagundua kuwa mifumo yote miwili haishiriki alama, na ni o̶r̶t̶h̶o̶g̶o̶n̶a̶l̶, Walakini, mchanganyiko huo sio kumaliza. Neno lifuatalo linaandika tena: $ f (p (0,1), p (0,1), p (0,1)) $. Kuna mfano zaidi wa mfano ambao mifumo yote miwili ni ngumu. Walakini orthogonality ni hali ya kutosha kwa kukomesha kawaida (pamoja na kutoshiriki symbols). see this survey of modularity results by Gramlich.  However, there are ways to modularly add rules to a rewrite system even with shared function symbols without introducing non-termination. The most common is dependency pairs. There is a syntactic criterion that guarentees that you do not add cycles to the dependency graph, which captures possible sequences of rule applications.  The dependency graph is uncomputable, but there is a simple heuristic which allows to over-approximate it in an efficient way. If the rule does add a cycle to the graph, all is not lost! It becomes necessary to attempt to find an ordering that makes the rule safe to remove. Here's an overview of the AProVE system which implements many many techniques to show termination of rewrite systems in general. You might want to check the associated references.

Ikiwa unatumia sura ya 26er, magurudumu 26 "na uma 29er, jiometri itakuwa ngumu. Inawezekana kuiweka, itafanya kazi, lakini baiskeli itakuwa ... ... vizuri, nilikuwa na makosa, ni ndio njia nyingine, itakuwa fupi mbele. Mto wa changarawe una axle kwa urefu wa taji aroun 400 mm (zaidi ya baiskeli za barabara ili kuongeza matairi makubwa). Kama ningekuwa wewe, ningependa be looking for a rigid 26er MTB fork. they are not rare. And quite often come.with straight steerers as required by the older MTB frames. As @mattnz requests, such a rigid fork should be corrected for the fork travel the frame was designed to be used with. For example, this is a 26" fork designed for frames used with forks with 100 mm travel (axle to crown 453 mm). https://surlybikes.com/parts/1x1_fork

Ndio, inawezekana. Lazima uondoe mkanda wa bar, na uondoe hoses kutoka kwa levers yako ya kuvunja kwa kuondoa karanga za compression. Kabla ya kuyaondoa, kumbuka ni nyuzi ngapi bado zinaonekana, kwa hivyo unajua jinsi ngumu kuirudisha nyuma baadaye. Ili kuunganisha hoses nyuma kwa levers unaweza kufuata mwongozo wa wafanyabiashara wa Shimano kwa levers yako ya kuvunja, ambayo unaweza kupata kwenye wavuti ya Shimano. When you reconnect the hoses, you have to use new insert pins and olives for your brake hose, because reusing the old ones will not seal the connection correctly. You can find them by searching for "SM-BH59-JK-SS olive" and cost around 1€.   While your brake hoses are disconnected some braking fluid might get lost and air can get trapped. In that case you have to bleed your brakes after the installation.

Najua kama matokeo ya algorithm ya Karger kwamba idadi ya kupunguzwa kwa kiwango cha chini imefungwa na $ \ binom {n} {2} $. Katika maoni ya kuhesabu idadi ya kupunguzwa kwa S-T tofauti in a oriented graph  It says that due to this consequnce, the cuts of an unweighted graph can be listed in polynomial time, but the claim is unreferenced.

Kwa sababu ya [Aho, Garey, na Ullman, kupunguzwa kwa transitive ya grafu iliyoelekezwa, 1972]; $ G^t = g - gg^+$, ambapo $ g^t $ ni kupunguzwa kwa $ g $. Katika kesi hii, $ g = G^+$. So, we can conclude $G^t = G - G^2$. Although this result does not lead to a linear non-approximate algorithm, I hope such an observation would be helpful in this context.

Maelezo yako ya mfano wa swali lako #2 la kuwa na uzani wa vertex na kusambaza uzito kwa $ V $ kwa majirani zake sauti za ukumbusho wa njia ya kusambaza inayotumika katika uthibitisho kuelekea Theorem ya rangi 4. Njia hiyo, hata hivyo, ilikuwa na uzani uliopewa wima na kwa nyuso za graph (sayari). Lakini naamini njia ya kutoa imepata programu zingine. Hapa kuna nadharia juu ya njia za kutoa: https://tel.archives-ouvertes.fr/tel-02083632/document Kama kwa swali lako la jumla #2 la shida zilizosomewa na uzani wa vertex, fikiria kutafuta neema labelings (e.g. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graceful_labeling) channel assignment problems (e.g. https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0166218X04002562) any vertex selection problem (like max clique, min vertex cover, etc) has a vertex-weighted analogue problems that choose orderings of vertices (i.e. assign a timestamp to vertices) like in fire-fighter problems (https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0012365X0600776X)  or graph burning problems (https://arxiv.org/abs/1507.06524) the definition of threshold graphs involves looking at a vertex-weighted graph and adding an edge between any two vertices whose sum of vertex weights exceeds some threshold value: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Threshold_graph  Here is a paper talking about more application problems of vertex-weighted graphs: https://www.researchgate.net/publication/268065544_Vertex-weighted_graphs_and_their_applications

Nina kikapu kilichowekwa mbele ya mikoba (kwa sababu nina kiti cha watoto kwenye rack nyuma). Pia nina taa ya kichwa kwenye mikoba (hii, ikiwa mtu yeyote anajali). Ikiwa kikapu hakina kitu, kinaonekana, kupitia matundu ambayo kikapu kimetengenezwa. Walakini, ikiwa nitaweka chochote kwenye kikapu, taa ya kichwa haina maana. Natafuta baiskeli kama usafirishaji wa msingi katika eneo la Kusini Bay. Kusafiri kwangu ni 5 mi, napenda kufanya safari za usiku mmoja mwishoni mwa wiki na kutumia baiskeli kwa ununuzi, ambayo itahusisha safari za mara kwa mara sio zaidi ya 30 mi. Bajeti yangu ni $ 1500, lakini singekuwa na nia ya kutumia kidogo ili usiwe na wasiwasi sana juu ya wizi na labda hata kupata baiskeli ya pili. Nilikwenda kwenye duka nyingi za baiskeli, lakini zinaonekana kuwa zinalenga zaidi kuelekea mbio au MTB, baiskeli chache sana hata zilikuwa na milipuko ya rack. Ninapenda zaidi ni Novara Randonee 2012 http://www.rei.com/product/816068/novara-randonee-bike-2012 lakini sina uhakika 100% ni baiskeli sahihi kwa kusudi langu. Wasiwasi wangu na Randonee ni: -main wasiwasi: Bar mwisho mabadiliko. Sijawahi kupata ncha za baa, lakini nina hisia kuwa hazifai kwa trafiki. Lazima nipitie mitaa michache na trafiki nzito sijisikii vizuri sana, hata bila kuchukua mikono yangu kwenye breki. Ninapenda vibadilishaji vilivyojumuishwa. -Ma wasiwasi: Randonee sio wazito (lbs 29), lakini kidogo sana hujengwa kwa kusudi langu. Sitafanya ziara zozote za zaidi ya a few days, most of my use will be running errands and doing tours (not races) with friends who have mostly cross or road bikes. I don't want to be the slowest.  Are these proper concerns? Did I overlook anything? Does one get used to the bar ends?  Other bikes I looked at:  -Novara Verita, $1200: Goes in the right direction, but sitting was uncomfortable compared to Randonee, and they weren't able to identify the problem in the shop.  -Fuji Cross 3.0, $800: 400318">http://www.performancebike.com/bikes/Product_10052_10551_1094122_-1_400318 I have doubts about the canti brakes, especially when wet.  -Salsa Vaya 2, $1700: BB5 disc brakes probably better than brakes on Randonee, far too expensive  -Fantom Outlaw, $999: http://www.bikesdirect.com/products/motobecane/outlaw.htm Cheaper version of salsa, but bad idea to buy without trying it out.  Anyway, these four only have double cranksets with a lowest ratio of 36:32, I am not sure this is low enough.   Bikes I read about but that I didn't see in any shop: Specialized Secteur, Surly LHT, Trek, Surly Cross Check   Are there other bikes I should look at that  -take a rack and fenders -have reliable brakes for all weather use in traffic -preferably have integrated shifters -low enough gear

Kwanza lazima tuamue juu ya kikoa cha pembejeo na matokeo, na jinsi zinavyowakilishwa na kile kinachopewa mashine na matokeo gani ya mashine. Afaiu, maswali yako kimsingi ni juu ya kile kinachochukuliwa kuwa uwasilishaji mzuri wa mambo ya muundo kwa kutumia pembejeo na matokeo ya mashine kwenye mfano (kamba katika kesi ya TM, nambari za asili katika kesi ya RAM, ...). Kuna idadi kubwa ya fasihi juu ya hii, tafuta "mifumo ya kumtaja", "uwakilishi", nk Baada ya kukubaliana juu ya njia gani nzuri ya kuweka coding/kuwakilisha vitu kwenye muundo kwa kutumia vitu vya pembejeo na pato la mfano wa mashine Zingine zinaweza kufanywa ukali kamili wa hesabu. Kama mfano, fikiria kazi za sehemu kutoka nambari za asili hadi nambari za asili, na mfano wa TM na RAM. Mfano wa RAM hupata pembejeo zake as integer variables, TM model gets them as strings over $\{0,1,b \}$. We have to first agree on how we are encoding the natural numbers in each model. For RAM let's take the trivial encoding, for TM the binary encoding of the natural numbers. After we agree on the encodings the rest is completely formal, any partial function over natural numbers computable in the RAM model is computable in the TM model using the above encodings.  All of this can be state clearly but many think that getting into these encoding stuff will distract and take unnecessary time from the main topics of an undergrad course in computability/complexity, when students intuition about these is good enough to deal with the main topics of the course there is not a need to complicate things by mentioning encodings, numberings, representations, naming systems, etc.

Swali lako kimsingi limefunikwa na COR 9.5 katika [1] ambayo inamaanisha kuwa kwa muda mrefu kama uwiano wa kibinafsi kwa kiwango cha asili umefungwa hapo juu na chini, wakati wa mchanganyiko wa matembezi haya ni sawa (up to constants) to the mixing time of the lazy walk on $G_1$. [1] Peres, Yuval, and Perla Sousi. "Mixing times are hitting times of large sets." Journal of Theoretical Probability 28, no. 2 (2015): 488-519. https://www.dpmms.cam.ac.uk/~ps422/mix-hit.pdf

Kwa kuzingatia grafu $ g = (v, e) $, mtu anaweza kuona $ m $ kwenye grafu kama kizigeu cha $ V $ ndani ya vertex seti $ s_ {i, j} $ kwa $ j \ katika \ {1 , 2 \} $, ambapo kila $ s_ {i, j} $ huchochea subgraph katika $ g $ isomorphic hadi $ k_ {j} $. Hiyo ni, kingo katika $ m $ zinahusiana na subgraphs isomorphic hadi $ k_ {2} $ na vertices zilizobaki (ambazo hazilinganishwe) zinahusiana na subgraphs isomorphic hadi $ k_ {1} $. Algorithm inayolingana inaweza kutazamwa kama kugawanya vertex iliyowekwa kwenye vifaa ambavyo vinasababisha kamili graphs, where we try to include as many $K_{2}$s as possible before resorting to $K_{1}$.  I'm interested in a generalization of this problem where $j$ is as large as possible (or perhaps some fixed j > 2, if there are nice results). In particular, I'd like an algorithm which first tries to find subsets of $V$ which induce subgraphs isomorphic to $K_{l}$, for $l$ as large as possible, and then $K_{l-1}$, etc.  Is there any work on problems like this?
